text.section: There is a Rural Legacy Board established in the Department of Natural Resources to administer the Rural Legacy Program.

The Board consists of the following members:
The Secretary of Agriculture;
The Secretary of Natural Resources; and
The Secretary of the Department of Planning.
The Secretary of Natural Resources shall serve as Chairman of the Board.

section.section: The Department of Natural Resources shall provide staff to the Board.
The Department of Agriculture and the Department of Planning may provide additional staff.
